titles.title: Providing for a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.
Providing for a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Declares that when the Senate recesses or adjourns on any day from Friday, March 27, 2015, through Monday, March 30, 2015, it stand recessed or adjourned until noon on Monday, April 13, 2015.
